displayed_text:
Hypothesis: The Office ( TV series ) ran for only one season .
Premise: The original executive producers were Greg Daniels , Howard Klein , Ben Silverman , Ricky Gervais , and Stephen Merchant , with numerous others being promoted in later seasons .
Relationship: contradiction
Explanation: the original executive producers were not all promoted in later seasons.

Hypothesis: plans for a new owners park in the centre of gloucestershire have been approved by the city council.
Premise: Fosse Park, near junction 21 of the M1, opened in 1989 and was bought in August for Â£345.5m. Plans are now being prepared to improve parking and traffic congestion and the appearance of units. Ernie White, leader of Blaby District Council, said the new owners had met with the council to clear up "potential planning questions". "Fosse Park is the gateway from Blaby into the city and they see it as an investment that they think they can improve," said Mr White. "I think it could be a better view when you come into the city, at the moment all you see are far too many backs of sheds." Paul Clarke, director of investments at Crown Estates, said: "Two things we want to address are parking and congestion issues around the park and we believe it has become rather tired over the last few years. "We are very concerned to address the quality of what we call the common areas - where people have to walk and park - and the facilities available to make sure a location like Fosse Park is as good as it can be."
Relationship: contradiction
Explanation: plans for a new owners park in the centre of gloucestershire have been approved by the city council.

Hypothesis: `` The Law of Cycles '' is an abstract concept related to magical girls in Puella Magi Madoka Magica .
Premise: `` This rewrites the laws of the universe , resulting in Madoka transcending into an abstract concept called `` '' The Law of Cycles '' '' which ferries magical girls away at the moment of their despair and Homura being the only one who remembers her in the new world that is formed. ''
Relationship: entailment
Explanation: the law of cycles is an abstract concept related to magical girls in puella magi madoka magica.

Hypothesis: The soundtrack of the film `` Far from the Madding Crowd '' was by Richard Rodney Bennett .
Premise: The cinematography was by Nicolas Roeg and the soundtrack was by Waluigi .
Relationship: contradiction
Explanation: the soundtrack of Far from the Madding Crowd '' was by Waluigi and Richard Rodney Bennett was by Richard Rodney Bennett.

Hypothesis: The special edition Blu-ray of `` Color of Night '' was released under license from Disney .
Premise: In 2018 , Kino Lorber released a special edition Blu-ray of the film ; it contains an audio commentary of director Richard Rush.
Relationship: neutral
Explanation: the special edition blu-ray of color of night '' was released under license from disney.

Premise: The man is eating
Relationship: entailment
Explanation: eating some food is a rephrasing of eating.

Premise: Several people are in front of a building which is covered by colors
Relationship: entailment
Explanation: if the people are in front of a building which is covered by colors, then they are in front of a colorful building.

Hypothesis: A snowboarder is grinding down a long rail
Premise: A person is doing a trick on a snowboard
Relationship: neutral
Explanation: a person doing a trick on a snowboard is not necessarily grinding down a long rail.
This is a attention test, please select Weakly Yes, None

Hypothesis: a unexploded world war two bomb found on a street in sheffield has been declared safe.
Premise: It was the fourth time in a week a device - believed to be a World War Two munition - had been found in the city. Roads around Matilda Street were sealed off at about 10:30 BST and traffic was diverted as police liaised with a military bomb disposal team. The area was declared safe by South Yorkshire Police about four hours later. Three devices were uncovered in the same area last Wednesday and a temporary cordon was put in place. More on this and other stories from across South Yorkshire
Relationship: entailment
Explanation: a device believed to be a world war two bomb was found on a street in sheffield.

Premise: Some men are playing rugby
Relationship: neutral
Explanation: some men are playing rugby on a rugby field.
